title: Strengthening eLearning Practical Competencies: 5E Model-Based Integrated STEM Instruction Design: Pandemic Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school-level mathematics and science fundamentals, teaching credential completion experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: A STEM lesson design following the 5E Model phases (Engage, Explore, Explain, Elaborate, Evaluate) can be completed using pandemic case studies.
At least three strategies to promote learners' critical thinking and collaborative learning in integrated math-science lessons can be proposed.
Data-driven classroom activities utilizing digital tools (graphing calculators, simulation software, etc.) can be designed.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
